instructions: Press the Bixby button or swipe right on your phone's home screen. Tap the next (arrow) button . Enter your Samsung account credentials or Create account . If creating an account, enter details, agree to the terms, and verify account details through email. If prompted to "Use your biometrics", tap Not now. Tap the next (arrow) button . Review the terms and conditions and tap the next (arrow) button . If desired, teach Bixby your voice and tap the next (arrow) button . Tap the next (arrow) button for the final time.
